title: Sample HTML Content
description: This is a sample JSON file with HTML content to test the new HTML rendering feature.
htmlContent:
Welcome to JSON Hero

This HTML content should be rendered beautifully with our new HTML preview feature!

  • Lists work too
  • And emphasized text
  • Even links
simpleHtml:
Simple HTML

This is just a simple paragraph with code and highlighted text.
plainText: This is just plain text without any HTML
notHtml: This might look like HTML but <notreal>it's not</notreal> valid
richContent:
Article Title

January 15, 2024

This is a rich HTML article with proper semantic markup. It includes bold text, italic text, and even links.

This is a quote within the article.

And here's some more content with a list:

  1. First item
  2. Second item with inline code
  3. Third item
